title: Shri Ganapati Aarti
prayer:
Sukhkarta Dukhharta Varta Vighnachi ॥
Nurvi Purvi Prem Krupa Jayachi ॥
Sarvangi Sundar Uti Shendurachi ॥
 Kanti Jhalke Mal Mukataphalaanchi..॥1॥

 Jaidev Jaidev Jai Mangal Murti ॥
 Darshan Maatre Man: Kaamna Phurti ॥
 Ratnakhachit Phara Tujh Gaurikumra ॥
 Chandanaachi Uti Kumkumkeshara ॥
 Hirejadit Mukut Shobhato Bara ॥
 Runjhunati Nupure(2) Charani Ghagriya ॥2॥

 Jaidev Jaidev Jai Mangal Murti ॥
 Lambodar Pitaambar Phanivarvandana ॥
 Saral Sond Vakratunda Trinayana ॥
 Das Ramacha Vat Pahe Sadana ॥
 Sankati Pavave Nirvani Rakshave Survarvandana ॥
 Jaidev Jaidev Jai Mangal Murti ॥3॥

title: Shri Dattachi Aarti
prayer:
Trigunatmaka Traimurti Datta Ha Jana।
				Triguni Avatara Trailokyarana।
				Neti Neti Shabda Na Ye Anumana।
				Suravara Munijana YogiSamadhi Na Ye Dhyana॥
				Jai Deva Jai Deva Jai Shri Gurudatta।
				Aarti Ovalita Harali Bhavachinta॥
				Sabahya Abhyantari Tu Ek Datta।
				Abhagyasi Kaisi Na Kale Hi Maata।
				Parahi Paratali Tethe Kaicha Heta।
				Janmamaranacha Puralase Anta॥
				Jai Deva Jai Deva Jai Shri Gurudatta।
				Aarti Ovalita Harali Bhavachinta॥
				Datta Yeuniya Ubha Thakala।
				Sadbhave Sashtange Pranipata Kela।
				Prasanna Houni Ashirwada Didhala।
				Janmamaranacha Phera Chukavila॥
				Jai Deva Jai Deva Jai Shri Gurudatta।
				Aarti Ovalita Harali Bhavachinta॥
				Datta Datta Aise Lagale Dhyana।
				Harapale Mana Jhale Unmana।
				Mi Tu Panachi Jhali Bolavana।
				Eka Janardani Shri Datta Dhyana॥
				Jai Deva Jai Deva Jai Shri Gurudatta।
				Aarti Ovalita Harali Bhavachinta॥

title: Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi
prayer:
Digambara Digambara Shripad Vallabh Digambara
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi,
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi,
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi
 Padopadi Apar Jhalya Punyachya Rashi,
 Sarvahi Tirthe Ghadli Aamha Aadikaruni Kashi
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi,
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi
 Mrudung Taal Ghosh Bhakt Bhavarthe Gaati,
 Mrudung Taal Ghosh Bhakt Bhavarthe Gaati
 Naamsankitrane Nityanande Nachti,
 Naamsankitrane Nityanande Nachti,
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi,
 Koti Brahmahatya Hariti Karita Dandavata
 Koti Brahmahatya Hariti Karita Dandavata
 Lontagan Ghalita Moksh Lode Payata,
 Lontagan Ghalita Moksh Lode Payata
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi,
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi,
 Guru Bhajanacha Mahima Na Kale Aagmanigmansi
 Guru Bhajanacha Mahima Na Kale Aagmanigmansi,
 Anubhava Ne Janati Te Gurupadiche Rahivasi
 Anubhava Ne Janati Te Gurupadiche Rahivasi,
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi,
 Pradakshina Karuni Deh Bhave Vahila
 Pradakshina Karuni Deh Bhave Vahila
 Shrirngaatmaj Vitthal Pudhe Ubha Rahila,
 Shrirngaatmaj Vitthal Pudhe Ubha Rahila
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi,
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi,
 Dhanya Dhanya Ho Pradakshina Sadguru Rayachi
 Jhali Tavra Survra Viman Utrayachi,
 Datt Digmbara Ya Ho Swami Mala Bhet Dya Ho,
 Datt Digmbara Ya Ho Swami Mala Bhet Dya Ho
 Digambara Digambara Shripad Vallabh Digambara.
